1423230.name: Skade
1423230.description:
About

In this single player narrative-driven adventure game, you take on the role of Skade, a Jotunn woman, with a soul burdened by loss seeking justice upon the gods who murdered her father.
“Skade” is an interactive, narrative tale of loss, grief, revenge, and forgiveness, set in the universe of Norse Mythology.

Gameplay:

Skade is a 2.5D sidescroller with a deep narrative storyline. Meant to be an immersive story mainly, “Skade” bolsters simple gameplay mechanics, with rich dialogue and breathtaking visuals.
Discover hidden paths, solve puzzles, and uncover tales of the gods as you traverse beautifully crafted environments inspired by Norse folklore.

Key features

- Explore the world of Norse Mythology
- Encounter fabled creatures from Scandinavian Folklore
- Immerse yourself into a story of personal loss
- Let yourself be transported by the spellbinding soundtrack
- A unique point of view on Norse Deities
